Class EnemyPyro

java.lang.Object
model.Entity
model.GameCharacter
model.NonPlayableCharacter
model.Enemy
model.EnemyUnstoppable
model.EnemyPyro
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<GameCharacter>, VisitorAcceptor
public class EnemyPyro extends EnemyUnstoppable
This enemy represents a special effects that damage the player character as an enemy when collides with him.

  • Constructor Details

    • EnemyPyro

      public EnemyPyro(int yPanel, int xPanel, int speed, int h, int w, int lives, boolean scoreGiver, int scoreValue, List<Dir> dirs, NpcMediator npcMediator)
      Constructor of an EnemyPyro. Panel modifiers are fixed at creation. This character can only move in a specific direction. When it leaves the grid it is destroyed by the mediator.
      Parameters:
      yPanel - starting y panel
      xPanel - starting x panel
      speed - starting speed
      h - enemy's Height
      w - enemy's Width
      lives - starting lives
      scoreGiver - if enemy is a scoreGiver
      scoreValue - enemy's score value
      dirs - this enemy modifiers direction
      npcMediator - enemy's npc mediator
